meanings.definition: The act of shooting with great accuracy or precision.
meanings.sent1: During the sharpshootings competition, the participants aimed carefully at the targets.
meanings.sent2: The sharpshootings of the skilled sniper impressed everyone at the shooting range.
meanings.sent3: The sharpshootings contest turned into a friendly competition among friends.
meanings.sent4: Her sharpshootings with words always hit the mark in debates.
meanings.sent5: The sharpshootings of the archer were so precise that every arrow found its target.

meanings.definition: A person skilled in shooting accurately.
meanings.sent1: The sharpshootings was known for hitting bullseyes every time.
meanings.sent2: The sharpshootings was recruited by the military for their exceptional marksmanship.
meanings.sent3: The sharpshootings entertained the crowd with their incredible aim at the carnival.
meanings.sent4: His sharpshootings were like magic, never missing a shot.
meanings.sent5: The sharpshootings' accuracy was unmatched, making them a legend in shooting sports.

meanings.definition: The occurrence of multiple accurate shootings.
meanings.sent1: The sharpshootings in the city left everyone shocked and scared.
meanings.sent2: The sharpshootings incidents prompted the authorities to increase security measures.
meanings.sent3: The sharpshootings spree in the action movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: The sharpshootings of the gang members caused chaos in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The sharpshootings at the competition showcased the participants' incredible precision.
